org.opends.server.loggers

Class AbstractLogger.LoggerStorage<P extends LogPublisher<C>,C extends LogPublisherCfg>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.loggers.AbstractLogger.LoggerStorage<P,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The concrete LogPublisher type
    C - The concrete LogPublisherCfg type
    Enclosing class:
    AbstractLogger<P extends LogPublisher<C>,C extends LogPublisherCfg>

    protected static class AbstractLogger.LoggerStorage<P extends LogPublisher<C>,C extends LogPublisherCfg>
extends java.lang.Object
    The storage designed to store log publishers. It is helpful in abstracting away the methods used to manage the collection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractLogger.LoggerStorage()
      Defined as public to allow subclasses of AbstractLogger to instantiate it.
